short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Personalize your new tab with Markdown!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Echo extension for Google Chrome is an innovative tool that allows users to personalize their new browser tab using Markdown language. Designed with users in mind who seek a simple and effective way to tailor their online environment, Echo provides unique features that make the new tab not only functional but also aesthetically pleasing.
